comment: Handle Do Forward Roll action - chance-based gymnastics maneuver with 4 outcomes

actions.comment: Fixed difficulty contest using mobility_skill vs difficulty 50
Set common variables needed by the end-turn macros
Handle CRITICAL_SUCCESS outcome - flat structure (1 of 4)

parameters.description_text: {context.actorName} executes a perfect forward roll, tucking tightly and flowing seamlessly back to their feet with natural grace.
parameters.actor_description: I execute a perfect forward roll, the motion fluid and effortless as I flow back to my feet.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear the swift, fluid sound of someone rolling effortlessly across the ground.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I feel the floor vibrate briefly as someone performs a graceful roll nearby.

parameters.value: {context.actorName} executes a perfect forward roll, tucking tightly and flowing seamlessly back to their feet with natural grace.

actions.comment: Handle SUCCESS outcome - flat structure (2 of 4)

parameters.description_text: {context.actorName} tucks down and rolls forward smoothly, rising centered and ready.
parameters.actor_description: I tuck down and roll forward smoothly, rising centered and ready.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear the sound of someone rolling across the ground.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I feel the floor shift as someone rolls nearby.

parameters.value: {context.actorName} tucks down and rolls forward smoothly, rising centered and ready.

actions.comment: Handle FAILURE outcome - flat structure (3 of 4)

parameters.description_text: {context.actorName} attempts a forward roll but loses momentum mid-tuck, awkwardly regaining their footing.
parameters.actor_description: I attempt a forward roll but lose momentum mid-tuck, awkwardly getting back to my feet.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear an unsteady thump and shuffling as someone struggles to complete a roll.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I feel uneven vibrations from someone fumbling through a roll.

parameters.value: {context.actorName} attempts a forward roll but loses momentum mid-tuck, awkwardly regaining their footing.

actions.comment: Handle FUMBLE outcome - flat structure (4 of 4)

parameters.description_text: {context.actorName} misjudges the forward roll, momentum carrying them over into an ungraceful crash to the ground.
parameters.actor_description: I misjudge the forward roll, momentum carrying me over as I crash ungracefully to the ground.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a heavy thud as someone crashes to the ground.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I feel a jarring impact through the floor as someone falls hard nearby.

parameters.value: {context.actorName} misjudges the forward roll, momentum carrying them over into an ungraceful crash to the ground.
